item.title: 麻省理工学院加入资金威胁下出售债券的高校大军
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统执政期间，联邦资金受到威胁，各大学纷纷向债券市场借钱，麻省理工学院（Massachusetts Institute of Technology）是最新一所向债券市场借钱的精英大学。【原文：The Massachusetts Institute of Technology is the latest elite college to borrow money from the bond market as universities contend with threats to federal funding under President Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 贝森特称赞美国是全球资本的 "首选目的地
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）称美国是全球资本的 "首选目的地"，并认为特朗普政府的政策将巩固这一地位；他反驳了上个月出现的所谓 "抛售美国 "主题。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent touted the US as the “premier destination” for global capital and argued that the Trump administration’s policies will solidify that position — countering the so-called sell America theme that materialized last month.】

item.title: Rivian 斥资 1.2 亿美元建立电动汽车供应商园区，加深与伊利诺伊州的联系
item.description: Rivian Automotive 公司将投资 1.2 亿美元在伊利诺伊州新建一个供应商园区，这是该公司宣布斥资 15 亿美元在伊利诺伊州扩建工厂的计划后，州长 JB Pritzker 获得的又一胜利。【原文：Rivian Automotive Inc. is investing $120 million in a new supplier park in Illinois, another win for Governor JB Pritzker after the company announced a $1.5 billion plan to expand its plant in the state.】

item.title: 矿业谋杀案显示秘鲁与非法淘金热的斗争
item.description: 上周末，秘鲁一座金矿的 13 名工人的尸体被发现，犯罪团伙为争夺该国北部高地贵金属的控制权而加紧了恐怖活动。【原文：The bodies of 13 workers at a Peruvian gold mine were discovered over the weekend as criminal groups step up a wave of terror over control of the precious metal in the country’s northern highlands.】

item.title: 阿波罗的罗文称贸易混乱使美国 "只是例外
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.首席执行官马克-罗文（Marc Rowan）表示，特朗普政府通过关税实现其目标 "并没有错"，但如果不解决贸易方面的不确定性，美国将面临经济放缓的风险。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. Chief Executive Officer Marc Rowan said the Trump administration “is not wrong” in the goals it’s seeking through tariffs, but that the US risks slowing the economy if it doesn’t resolve uncertainty around trade.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯的预算赤字在石油价格暴跌前就已飙升
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯第一季度的预算赤字急剧膨胀，甚至在石油价格最近一次下跌给王国财政带来额外压力之前就已经如此。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s budget deficit ballooned in the first quarter, even before oil’s latest drop put additional pressure on the kingdom’s finances.】

item.title: 工会称 Ecopetrol 面临哥伦比亚 22 亿美元税收索赔风险
item.description: 据这家国营石油生产商的主要工会称，哥伦比亚税务机构向其索赔 22 亿美元，使 Ecopetrol SA 的财务状况岌岌可危。【原文：Ecopetrol SA’s finances are at risk from a $2.2 billion claim from Colombia’s tax agency, according to the state oil producer’s main workers union.】

item.title: Robinhood 的竞争对手 EToro 集团及其支持者在美国首次公开募股中寻求 5 亿美元资金
item.description: EToro Group Ltd. 及其部分股东正寻求在美国首次公开募股中筹集多达 5 亿美元的资金，此前该交易和投资平台因关税相关的股票波动而暂停了上市计划。【原文：EToro Group Ltd. and some of its shareholders are seeking to raise as much as $500 million in a US initial public offering, after the trading and investment platform paused its listing plans amid tariff-related stock volatility.】

item.title: 印度对美国汽车零部件和钢铁征收零关税
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，印度在与美国的贸易谈判中提议在对等基础上对钢铁、汽车零部件和药品征收零关税，但仅限于一定数量的进口。【原文：India has proposed zero tariffs on steel, auto components and pharmaceuticals on a reciprocal basis up to a certain quantity of imports in its trade negotiations with the US, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Crossover Markets 准备在对加密货币友好的美国上市
item.description: 数字资产交易公司Crossover Markets Group Inc.正准备在美国首次推出其平台，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统的亲行业议程推动了机构对加密货币的兴趣，并为世界最大经济体制定更有利的法规创造了条件。【原文：Digital-asset trading firm Crossover Markets Group Inc. is preparing to debut its platform in the US as President Donald Trump’s pro-industry agenda drives institutional interest in cryptocurrencies and sets the stage for more favorable regulations in the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 贝索斯支持的核聚变公司就资金紧张问题发出呼吁
item.description: 由杰夫-贝索斯（Jeff Bezos）支持的加拿大初创公司 General Fusion Inc.【原文：General Fusion Inc., a Canadian startup backed by Jeff Bezos, is making a plea to investors after raising more than $300 million to develop a system that would harness the power of the stars.】

item.title: 美国银行称 "特朗普认沽 "将限制公司债券利差扩大
item.description: 据美国银行称，信贷市场有望得到白宫的支持，这将限制今年利差扩大的程度。【原文：Credit markets can expect support from the White House that will limit the extent of spread widening this year, according to Bank of America.】

item.title: 联合国最高法院驳回苏丹针对阿联酋的种族灭绝案件
item.description: 联合国最高法庭称，它无权裁决苏丹就北非国家内战中的种族灭绝指控起诉阿拉伯联合酋长国的案件。【原文：The top United Nations court said it lacks the jurisdiction to decide on a case brought by Sudan against the United Arab Emirates over genocide allegations in the North African country’s civil war.】

item.title: 美国服务提供商的增长在 3 月份下滑后有所回升
item.description: 美国服务供应商的活动在上月下滑后于 4 月份加速，而材料价格则因关税升级而上涨。【原文：Activity at US service providers accelerated in April after a slumping in the prior month, while materials prices increased in response to escalating tariffs.】

item.title: 德国天然气储存新目标将于周二生效
item.description: 德国新的较低天然气储存目标将于本周二生效，目的是减轻燃料储备工作的压力。【原文：Germany’s new lower gas storage targets will come into force on Tuesday as the country aims to ease pressure on fuel stockpiling efforts.】

item.title: 美联储会议临近，关税疑虑犹存，美股涨势降温
item.description: 美国股市周一下跌，S&P 500 指数有望中断二十年来最长的连涨势头，原因是贸易政策方面喜忧参半的信息给市场前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：US stocks fell Monday with the S&P 500 on track to snap its longest winning streak in two decades as mixed messages on trade policy clouded the market outlook.】

item.title: 据说壳牌正在研究收购的好处，英国石油公司（BP）股价上涨
item.description: 据彭博社报道，壳牌石油公司正在与顾问合作评估收购其英国竞争对手的可能性，英国石油公司（BP Plc）周一上涨。【原文：BP Plc rose on Monday after Bloomberg reported that Shell Plc is working with advisers to evaluate a potential acquisition of its UK rival.】

item.title: 花旗银行在撤退后重启向收购基金提供贷款的业务
item.description: 花旗集团正在加大对私募股权和私人信贷集团的贷款力度，努力追赶摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）和高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc. is ramping up lending to private equity and private credit groups, working to catch up with peers like JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. after the bank spent years on the sidelines.】

item.title: 关税动荡以来沙特首次 IPO 吸引 200 亿美元订单
item.description: 沙特包装制造商联合纸箱工业公司（United Carton Industries Co.【原文：Saudi packaging manufacturer United Carton Industries Co. drew more than $20 billion in orders for its initial public offering, a sign that investor appetite for Middle Eastern listings continues despite tariff-induced market turmoil.】

item.title: 阿克曼抨击哈佛失败，呼吁普利兹克下课
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）对母校哈佛大学如何处理与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的冲突提出了一系列担忧，认为哈佛大学需要更换董事会领导层。【原文：Bill Ackman rattled off a list of concerns over how his alma mater Harvard University has handled the conflict with President Donald Trump, arguing it needs a change in board leadership.】

item.title: 匈牙利库拉利成为中央银行重组的赢家
item.description: 上个月加入匈牙利国家银行的佐尔坦-库拉利（Zoltan Kurali）在管理职位调整后成为该央行最有影响力的副行长。【原文：Zoltan Kurali, who joined the National Bank of Hungary last month, has become the central bank’s most influential vice governor after a shakeup in management roles.】

item.title: 3G Capital 将以每股 63 美元的价格收购 Skechers 鞋类品牌
item.description: 投资公司 3G Capital 将以每股 63 美元的价格收购鞋类制造商 Skechers USA Inc.【原文：Investment firm 3G Capital will acquire footwear maker Skechers USA Inc. for $63 per share, the company said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 汽车贷款亿万富翁汉基以 4385 万美元挂牌出售豪宅
item.description: 唐-汉基（Don Hankey）是特朗普的坚定支持者，以其次级汽车贷款帝国而闻名，他将以 4385 万美元的价格挂牌出售自己在佛罗里达州的豪宅，比 2021 年的购买价高出近 50%。【原文：Don Hankey, a staunch Trump supporter known for his subprime car-loan empire, is listing his Florida mansion for $43.85 million, a nearly 50% markup from his 2021 purchase price.】

item.title: 米尔肯研究所全球会议的最新情况
沙特支持的港口开发商考虑南非港口交易
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯港口运营商红海门户码头公司（Red Sea Gateway Terminal）在沙特阿拉伯王国 9,250 亿美元主权财富基金的支持下，正在评估是否竞标在非洲最大的海运枢纽开发和运营一个鲜活农产品码头。【原文：Saudi Arabian ports operator Red Sea Gateway Terminal, backed by the kingdom’s $925 billion sovereign wealth fund, is evaluating whether to bid to develop and run a fresh-produce terminal at Africa’s biggest maritime hub.】

item.title: 皮博迪称煤矿火灾有可能导致英格鲁煤炭公司收购失败
item.description: 皮博迪能源公司（Peabody Energy Corp.）表示，在英美资源集团位于澳大利亚的一座煤矿发生火灾后，该公司正在考虑放弃收购英美资源集团炼钢煤资产的交易。【原文：Peabody Energy Corp. said it’s considering walking away from a deal to acquire Anglo American Plc’s steelmaking coal assets after a fire at an Anglo mine in Australia.】

item.title: 苹果公司自 2023 年以来首次出售公司债券
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，苹果公司计划在周一出售投资级债券。【原文：Apple Inc. is planning to sell investment-grade bonds on Monday, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴西经济学家在政策会议前夕下调利率预测
item.description: 就在各国央行行长聚集一堂开始讨论下一次（也许是最后一次）借贷成本上调幅度的几个小时前，巴西经济学家下调了 2025 年年底基准利率预测。【原文：Brazil economists cut their 2025 year-end benchmark interest rate forecast just hours before central bankers gather to start debating the size of their next — and perhaps last — borrowing cost hike of their cycle.】

item.title: 随着关税、人工智能和服务业的动荡，苹果走到了关键时刻
item.description: 苹果公司正面临最艰难的时期之一，因为它要应对关税威胁、供应链挑战、人工智能斗争以及服务业务的潜在动荡。另外：该公司在中国推出的人工智能很可能是 iOS 18.6 的一部分，苹果的音乐和全球事务团队进行了重组，飞行出租车初创公司 Archer 聘请了一位新的人工智能主管。【原文：Apple is facing one of its toughest periods yet as it copes with the threat of tariffs, supply chain challenges, AI struggles and potential turmoil in its services business. Also: The company’s China AI launch will likely be part of iOS 18.6, reorganizations extend to Apple’s music and global affairs teams, and flying taxi startup Archer hires a new head of AI.】
